subsections.title: What is a Repeater, Offsets
subsections.label: subsec:repeater-basics
prompts: Explain the fundamental concept of a repeater station in amateur radio, including its purpose and how it operates.
Describe the concept of channel offsets in the context of repeater operation, including why they are necessary and how they are used.
Provide a detailed explanation of the technical aspects of how a repeater station simultaneously retransmits signals on different channels.
Discuss the role of repeater stations in enhancing communication range and reliability in amateur radio.
